Articles.Content: If something happens that appear in the flight log, the time is always wrong, lime it might say something happened at 0:00:17 or something when it happened about an hour into the flight. I use KSP 1.0.5.

First off, it might be a good idea to update to the newest version, 1.1, which came out recently.

Second off, this doesn't seem very important; if you're doing a challenge that requires exact times, perhaps you should try reinstalling the game?
